messages.content: You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Or, ni le texte initial de la Commission sur la vente et la garantie des biens de consommation, ni les amendements proposés par le rapport Kuhn ne répondent à ces critères.
However, neither the original Commission text on the sale of consumer goods and associated guarantees, nor the amendments proposed by the Kuhn report meet these criteria.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Tout d'abord, nous, membres de l'UPE, demandons la mise sur pied d'un programme d'action spécifique européen de cinq ans afin de combattre cette maladie, doté de ressources adéquates.
Firstly, we in the UPE Group are calling for a specific five-year EU action programme to combat this disease, backed-up with adequate resources.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: C'est en ce sens que la communauté internationale tente à présent d'influencer M. Netanyahou et c'est sur cet élément que notre attention va se concentrer.
It is a movement in that position which the world community is now impressing on Mr Netanyahu, and it is there that our main focus will concentrate.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Les bénéfices pétroliers de l'Angola dépassent et continueront ces prochaines années de dépasser les achats d'armes.
The oil profits in Angola are all going into buying arms, and will continue to do so over the coming years.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Monsieur le Président, tout d'abord je voudrais remercier M. Megahy et tous ceux qui ont contribué au débat.
Mr President, first I would like to thank Mr Megahy and all those who have contributed to the debate.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Le Bureau semble ici avoir recours à quelque chose qui lui est dicté d'en haut, et c'est un procédé antidémocratique.
What the Bureau seems to be resorting to here is diktat from on high, and it is very anti-democratic.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Il est urgent qu'un certain nombre d'États membres et, sans doute pas celui de la présidence en exercice, se mettent d'accord pour passer le plus rapidement possible à une Europe fédérale.
It is urgent for a certain number of Member States, undoubtedly not that of the President-in-Office, to come to an agreement to bring about as quickly as possible a federal Europe.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: ECHO est en train d'étudier leurs demandes d'intervention financière et une réunion doit avoir lieu aujourd'hui, 2 avril, au siège de la délégation de la Commission européenne à Brasilia.
ECHO is proceeding to analyse their requests for funding, and a meeting is being held today, 2 April, at the Delegation of the European Commission in Brasilia.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Vu la complexité du problème, tout le monde aura, chose inévitable, des réserves à émettre sur certaines parties du compromis.
It is inevitable, given the complexity of the problem, that everyone will have some significant reservations about some part of the package.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Toutefois, l'ouverture à la libéralisation est progressive et moins forte que ne le proposait initialement la Commission.
Nevertheless, the opening up to liberalization is progressive and not as strong as the Commission initially proposed.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: L'adoption de la monnaie unique met en place un engrenage tel qu'il pourrait bien amener les peuples à rejeter un jour en bloc l'idée même de la construction européenne.
The adoption of the single currency has established a process which could in fact lead the people one day to reject the whole idea of the construction of Europe.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: On doit les minimiser le plus possible sachant qu'il n'est pas possible de les éliminer totalement.
They must be minimized as far as possible, given that it is not possible to eliminate them altogether.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Ont-il su éviter de fragiliser les secteurs de l'agriculture et de la pêche, grâce à l'adoption de codes de conduite pour prévenir d'éventuels effets déstructurants?
Have they managed to avoid damaging the farming and fishing industries by adopting codes of conduct to prevent possible destructuring effects?
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Je forme le voeu que le Conseil et le Parlement continueront d'unir leurs efforts pour que ces deux propositions puissent être adoptées au plus vite.
I hope that the Council and the Parliament can continue to work closely together on both measures to make sure that they are adopted as soon as possible.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: La Commission craint naturellement que ce genre de décisions aient des répercussions négatives sur le pluralisme démocratique et sur la liberté d'expression en Turquie.
And the Commission is of course concerned that this sort of decision may have adverse effects on democratic pluralism and freedom of expression in Turkey.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: En fait, tout est affaire de volonté politique, d'autres que moi l'ont dit, et j'insiste sur ce point, rien d'important ne se fera si on ne le veut pas.
In fact, it is all a question of political will, others have said this and I would like to stress the point, nothing important will happen if we do not want it to.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Et c'est bien à ce jeu que le Parlement européen vient de se prêter en votant le rapport Herman.
And it is to this ploy that the European Parliament has just lent itself, by voting in favour of the Herman report.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Dans les propositions de la Commission sur l'Agenda 2000, nous avons déjà dénoncé le caractère constant du niveau retenu des prix et des aides sur une période de sept ans.
We have already criticized the fact that a constant level of prices and aid has been established in the Commission's proposals on Agenda 2000 for a period of seven years.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: On espérait que la libéralisation des échanges et la suppression des dommages produits par les protectionnismes d'avant-guerre apporteraient prospérité et à emploi.
The idea was that by liberalizing trade we would overcome the damage caused by protectionism before the war, and this would bring prosperity and jobs.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: L'imposition du travail frontalier est citée parmi les domaines pour lesquels une harmonisation fiscale serait nécessaire.
The taxation of border work is held up as one of the areas in which fiscal harmonization is necessary.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Nous voudrions également exprimer notre désir que rapidement, à l'aide de moyens politiques et sans nouvelle effusion de sang, les Guinéens - et pas des tiers - trouvent une solution durable au conflit actuel dans un cadre démocratique.
We would also like to express our hopes that the Guineans - and not any third parties - will quickly be able to find a lasting democratic solution by political means, without further bloodshed.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Il est utopique de penser que la forme administrative de la politique de l'aménagement du territoire des États membres puisse être harmonisée.
It is an illusion to think that it would be possible to harmonize regional development policy in the various Member States.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Le président Santer n'a-t-il pas affirmé le 27 mai dernier: »la Commission doit continuer à jouer son rôle politique, avec force et en toute indépendance.»
President Santer stated on 27 May, this year that the Commission must continue to play its political role, forcefully and totally independently.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Je tiens également à souligner que, dans certains pays, se produisent des effets politiques difficiles parce que toutes les régions ne se ressemblent pas et que tous les territoires n'ont pas de capacité politique.
I must also say that in some countries there are worrying political consequences because not all regions are equal and not all territories have political power.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: C'est pourquoi je pense que le nécessaire dialogue avec le Parlement européen s'impose dans une phase très précoce.
That is why I believe it advisable to hold the necessary dialogue with the European Parliament at a very early stage.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Même si le renforcement de la coopération ne couvre pas le deuxième pilier, l'idée que l'on puisse par là atteindre l'objectif du traité de Maastricht est intéressante.
Even though closer cooperation does not cover the second pillar, there is an interesting idea that the objectives of the Maastricht Treaty could be fulfilled there.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Malheureusement, le groupe socialiste et le groupe de la gauche unitaire européenne ne la soutiennent pas.
Unfortunately, the Socialist Group and the Confederal Group of the European United Left do not support it.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: En ce qui concerne les petites instances, le Conseil a une nouvelle fois appliqué la méthode de l'octroi d'un montant global forfaitaire pour les dépenses administratives, comme cela avait été fait l'année dernière.
For the small bodies, the Council has again applied the method established last year, of granting a flat-rate total amount for routine administrative expenditure.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Bien sûr, les intérêts des pays membres doivent être défendus car la transposition de l'Acte communautaire relève de ces pays eux-mêmes.
Naturally, the interests of the Member States must be represented in doing this because the implementation of Community acts is mostly a matter for the Member States.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Si on tire sur les convois, ils doivent pouvoir se défendre et donc être armés à cette fin.
If the convoys are fired on, they must be permitted to defend themselves, and they must be armed to do so.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Dans le même esprit, la résolution n'aborde aucune voie de régulation fiscale, par exemple comme cela pourrait être amorcé grâce à la création d'une taxe sur les mouvements de capitaux (taxe Tobin).
Similarly, the resolution does not suggest any ways of bringing about fiscal regulation such as might be launched with the introduction of a tax on capital movements (Tobin tax).
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Ce Parlement ne peut même pas empêcher les personnes de fumer dans des zones où il est interdit de fumer, comme juste à l'extérieur de cette enceinte.
This Parliament cannot even stop people smoking in areas where they are not meant to smoke, such as right outside this Chamber.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Mais peut-être faut-il également rappeler que les redevances ne sont pas des taxes et ne doivent être versées que pour des services rendus.
But perhaps we must also remember that these fees are not taxes and should only be paid for services rendered.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Les avantages possibles dans les domaines économiques et environnementaux sont également évidents: meilleure gestion temporelle et spatiale du trafic, transport multimodal, ...
The possible economic and financial advantages are equally obvious: improved traffic management in terms of time and space, multimodal transport, etcetera.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Je voudrais remercier les rapporteurs, MM. van Velzen, Adam et Soulier, pour ces trois rapports. Ils sont très bien faits.
I would like to thank the rapporteurs, Messrs van Velzen, Adam and Soulier, for these three excellent reports.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: À propos des amendements qui ne concernent que les considérants, à une exception près, je constate avec satisfaction que le rapporteur a soutenu tous les autres articles.
I turn now to the amendments, which with one exception concern only the recitals. I note with satisfaction that the rapporteur endorses all the other articles.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Je pense personnellement qu'il s'agit d'une victoire importante pour ce Parlement, qui a contraint la Commission à se montrer plus ouverte et responsable.
In my view, this has been a significant victory for Parliament in terms of making the Commission more open and accountable.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Je voudrais cependant que, dans le futur, nous nous engagions dans une voie qui aille au delà de ce que nous avons déjà accompli.
But I hope that in future we will embark on a road that takes us beyond what we have achieved so far.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Nous ne pouvons pas être séduits par un quelconque objectif, aussi noble soit-il, d'utilisation immédiate de ces réserves, qui aboutirait à une hausse significative de l'offre de dollars sur le marché mondial causant une diminution de sa valeur par rapport à l'euro.
We must not be tempted by any objective, however noble, for using these reserves at once, flooding the world markets with dollars and drastically reducing that currency's value against the euro.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: M. Mulder a soulevé la question intéressante de savoir pourquoi certains gouvernements réussissaient mieux que d'autres à appliquer les mesures relatives à l'environnement.
Mr Mulder raised the interesting point of why some national governments are more successful than others in bringing in the environmental measures.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Le document précédent, présenté par la Commission après que le Conseil lui a demandé d'intervenir, a introduit un instrument spécifique permettant à la Commission d'agir au plus vite dans de telles situations.
The previous document, introduced by the Commission after the Council had asked it to intervene, introduced an specific instrument to allow the Commission to act very quickly in such occurrences.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Je rappelle que les propositions d'amendement 3, 4 et 5 sont retirées au profit des formules de compromis des propositions d'amendement 8, 9 et 10 du Conseil.
Let me point out again that we are withdrawing Amendments Nos 3, 4 and 5 in favour of the compromise wording of the Council's Amendments Nos 8, 9 and 10.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Malheureusement, la Commission sait que, dans la pratique, ces avantages ne sont pas toujours accessibles aux ressortissants d'un État membre autre que celui qui les offre.
Regrettably, the Commission knows that in practice such discretionary concessions are not always freely accessible to nationals from the state other than the one which is offering the concessions.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: La législation sur les questions sociales, sur les différents droits revenant aux citoyens, etc. doit être élaborée pour l'essentiel au sein des États membres, et non par le biais de dispositions dans le cadre du traité sur l'Union.
Legislation on social issues, individual rights and so on should preferably be carried out by Member States and not through EU Treaty provisions.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Peut-être voit-on là l'influence de quelque État membre, la Commission devrait être plus généreuse et ne pas se laisser influencer par certaines pressions.
Perhaps we are seeing there the hand of a Member State, and the Commission should be more generous and not give in to certain pressures.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Dès lors, permettez-moi, en votre nom à tous, de lui faire parvenir nos félicitations et, par la même occasion, nos voeux de prompt rétablissement car nous avons besoin de lui parmi nous le vendredi.
Therefore, on behalf of everyone, allow me to send him our congratulations and our best wishes for a speedy recovery because we do indeed need him here with us on Fridays.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Elle se dote aussi d'une présence sur la scène internationale, qui va davantage correspondre à son poids en matière économique.
Europe will also have a presence in the international arena which will better reflect its weight in economic matters.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Il a été d'accord avec la réduction de 500 millions d'écus en ce qui concerne les paiements mais il s'est en même temps débarrassé de la réserve.
It has agreed with the ECU 500m cut in payments but, at the same time, it has also got rid of the reserve.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: L'Union risque de connaître une longue période de crise et d'incertitude et est bien près d'envoyer des signaux très négatifs et très décourageants aux pays candidats.
The Union runs the risk of a prolonged period of uncertainty and crisis, and stands on the threshold of sending deeply negative and dispiriting signals to applicant states.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Nous ne pouvons pas non plus accepter les parties des amendements 28 à 30 qui visent à avancer la mise en oeuvre.
Nor can we accept the parts of Amendments Nos 28 to 30 which are aimed at bringing the implementation forward.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Ces sociétés, dans leur fonctionnement démocratique, sont à la recherche permanente de nouveaux équilibres.
Legislation therefore becomes the dominant social regulator, given the dearth of spontaneous solutions to conflicts.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Elle ne figure pas à l'agenda parce que l'élargissement à l'est souhaité est imminent.
It has not been put on the agenda because of the imminent advent of the enlargement eastward that we hope to see.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Les premiers documents d'identité électroniques correspondant à cette loi, autrement dit des cartes à puce permettant de générer des signatures électroniques, ont été commercialisées la semaine dernière.
The first electronic identity cards, in other words smart cards with which electronic signatures can be produced, have been on the market since last week.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Monsieur le Président, s'agissant du sujet qui nous occupe cet après-midi, je pense que nous nous accordons tous sur le fait que les consommateurs demandent de plus en plus de produits organiques.
Mr President, in terms of our subject this afternoon, we all agree that there is a steadily increasing consumer demand for organic products.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Les mesures d'assainissement financier et administratif préconisées par la résolution socialiste s'inscrivent dans le droit fil du plan du président de la Commission.
The measures for financial and administrative reorganisation advocated in the Socialist resolution are along the same lines as the plan put forward by the President of the Commission.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Et ce, dans la mesure où leur intérêt bien compris d'un développement au moindre coût rencontre ici à l'évidence notre recherche de marchés extérieurs.
This must occur in such a way so as to ensure that their natural interest in guaranteeing development at the lowest possible cost matches our search for external markets.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Monsieur le Président, Mesdames et Messieurs, en tant que rapporteur, il est des choses étranges que l'on découvre à l'écoute du débat sur le rapport précédent.
Mr President, ladies and gentlemen, a rapporteur can discover some astonishing things when he listens to the debate on the preceding report.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: J'espère donc que le Parlement européen adoptera ce texte, qui garantira un niveau élevé de protection de l'environnement.
I therefore hope that the European Parliament will adopt this text, which guarantees a high level of environmental protection.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: M. le député semble dire que l'appel d'offres relatif au tunnel a été lancé.
I have the impression that the honourable Member believes the public invitation to tender in connection with the tunnel has already started.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Nous accordons une très grande importance à ce dialogue au niveau politique pour clôturer l'Agenda de façon satisfaisante et dans les délais impartis.
We attach the utmost importance to this dialogue at political level as a means of concluding the Agenda successfully and on schedule.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Le contrôle du respect des mesures prises est le deuxième point à propos duquel nous pensons que la proposition a besoin d'être renforcée.
The second point on which we think the proposal could be tightened up is the monitoring of compliance.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Nous voulons appliquer la nouvelle approche. La normalisation a justement montré qu'il était nécessaire de réfléchir ensemble à la manière d'en améliorer le processus.
We want the new approach, and specifically in the area of standards we have seen that it is necessary to reflect together on how we can secure better procedures.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: J'espère donc vivement que nous parviendrons à faire en sorte que ces choses soient traitées d'une manière identique et avec une implication totale du Parlement.
So I very much hope that we can arrive at a situation in which all these things are dealt with uniformly and with the full involvement of Parliament.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: L'amendement 4 revêt une importance particulière. Grâce à celui-ci, le Parlement peut interagir avec les autorités et les systèmes nationaux dans les procédures pouvant aboutir à la résiliation du mandat parlementaire européen.
Amendment No 4 is of particular importance: it enables Parliament to interact with national authorities in procedures which might lead to the disqualification of a Member from holding office.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: A présent, l'exclusion du champ d'application de cette directive des équipements sous pression transportables utilisés exclusivement pour des opérations de transport de marchandises entre le territoire de la Communauté et celui des pays tiers est explicite.
It is now clear that transportable pressure equipment used exclusively for goods transport between the Community and third countries is excluded from the scope of this directive.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: L'Europe devra prêcher la modération et le compromis, tout en espérant que la population et le gouvernement israéliens voudront bien s'engager sur le chemin de la paix et du dialogue.
Europe must preach moderation and a willingness to compromise and must hope that the people and government of Israel can find the way to peace and dialogue.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Et je me félicite qu'un certain nombre d'entre vous, concernant l'amélioration des marchés des capitaux - je pense à Mme Boogerd-Quaak ou à M. de Lassus -, aient évoqué le problème du capital risque et de son développement.
I welcome the fact that some of you, particularly Mrs Boogerd-Quaak and Mr de Lassus, mentioned the problem of risk capital and its development in the context of improving the capital markets.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: La scolarisation des filles revêt une importance capitale, car les faits démontrent que les femmes instruites courent un moindre risque de mortalité maternelle et infantile.
Education for girls is of crucial importance since the figures show that educated women are at less risk from maternal and infant mortality.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following French text into English: Ce rapport sera précédé par une vaste consultation qui sera ouverte à tous les secteurs intéressés, sous la forme d'un Livre vert, présenté juste après l'adoption de la présente proposition.
That report will be preceded by wide-ranging consultations, open to all the sectors concerned, in the form of a green paper to be presented as soon as this proposal has been adopted.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: L'échange systématique d'informations prévu par la résolution devrait représenter un progrès essentiel.
A system for exchanging information such as that described in the resolution would represent a considerable step forward.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and French. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following French text into English: Ici, la Commission a proposé une période transitoire de sept ans pour l'application de la moyenne maximale de 48 heures, dans certaines conditions.
